solution_line_template: There are {first_on} people on the bus after the first stop.
There are {after_first}+{second_on}-{second_off}=<<{after_first}+{second_on}-{second_off}={after_second}>>{after_second} people on the bus after the second stop.
There are {after_second}+{third_on}-{third_off}=<<{after_second}+{third_on}-{third_off}={after_third}>>{after_third} people on the bus after the third stop.
